title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn more](https://web.dev/color-contrast/).

node.snippet: <a alt="Complete a Library Request" class="btn btn-default btn-lg" data-linktype="external" data-toolbox-autogen="title" data-val="/about/transportation-facts" href="/about/transportation-facts" rel="noopener" target="_blank" text=" Complete a Library Request">
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.31 between the foreground and shadow color (foreground color: #c3ccd2, text-shadow color: #367096, font size: 15.0pt (20px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
